participant_1.background:
I like to start my day with a cup of coffee in the woods.
I have several barn cats, they are a great source of entertainment when I'm not feeling productive.
My biggest animal sighting was a great white shark swimming beside our boat off the coast of South Africa.
I have more important things to focus on than my appearance.
My art is a great way to express myself and connect with others.

participant_2.background:
I won a bowling tournament last year, and my CD collection is still safe.
My favorite thing to do is watch TV and admire beautiful flowers.
I'm just trying to live my life and be myself, and I enjoy country music, tattoos, and iced tea.
I've found that reading to my baby is a great way to bond with her and help her learn new things.
I am an American who enjoys the culture of my neighbors.

content.text: Hey, nice to meet you! What's your favorite way to start your day?
Hi there! I usually start my day by watching TV and admiring beautiful flowers. How about you?
I like to start my day with a cup of coffee in the woods. I have several barn cats, they are a great source of entertainment when I'm not feeling productive.
That sounds peaceful and relaxing! I love cats. I'm just trying to live my life and be myself, and I enjoy country music, tattoos, and iced tea.
I like to listen to country music too! I'm a huge fan of Jason Aldean. I'm also into tattoos, but I don't have any yet.
I've got a few tattoos, but I'm always looking for new ideas. What kind of tattoos are you interested in?
I'm not really sure yet. I'm thinking about getting a tattoo of a tree or a bird. What about you?
I've got a few tree tattoos, but I'd love to get a tattoo of a lion.
Lions are cool! I could see myself getting a tattoo of a lion.
Maybe we can get matching tattoos!
